output.wear_observations: High points of portrait show moderate wear with hair curls still visible. Legend letters remain sharp except for partial softness at 3 o'clock position. Reverse figure retains good detail on drapery folds.

output.strike_quality: Well-centered on both sides. Strike appears strong with no weakness on legend or devices.

Minor die crack from 2 o'clock toward portrait

output.wear_observations: Minimal high-point wear observed. Portrait details including individual hair strands remain crisp. All legend letters fully formed with sharp edges. Reverse shows complete detail on all devices.
output.surface_notes: Original luster visible in protected areas. No cleaning evidence detected. Minor contact marks in right field consistent with ancient handling.
output.strike_quality: Exceptionally well-struck. Full centering on both dies. Die state appears early with no signs of die wear.

Edge smoothing may indicate past cleaning
